Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Commands

Interface Command

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
ClientCommand, ServerCommand
All Known Implementing Classes:
AddChatMessageCommand, BroadcastMessageCommand, ConfirmSelectionCommand, CreateLobbyCommand, CreatePlayerCommand, DirectMessageCommand, DrawFromDeckCommand, DrawFromVisibleCardsCommand, EndGameCommand, GameTransitionCommand, JoinLobbyCommand, KeepAliveCommand, LeaveGameCommand, LeaveLobbyCommand, PauseGameCommand, PickColorCommand, PickObjectiveCommand, PlaceCardCommand, PlaceCardCommand, ReceiveCardCommand, ReceiveObjectiveChoiceCommand, ReplaceCardsCommand, RestoreGameCommand, SetLobbiesCommand, SetNicknameCommand, SetPlayerActivityCommand, StartGameCommand, ThrowExceptionCommand, UpdateLobbyCommand
public interface Command extends Serializable
Represents a generic command in this application.

Commands that implement this interface encapsulate actions or operations that can be executed within the application. By extending Serializable, commands can be serialized into a stream of bytes, allowing them to be transferred over a network or stored persistently.

Implementing classes should provide specific logic in the execute() method to perform their intended operation when invoked.
